mean_cn: v.表示，打算；  n.平均值，中庸；  adj.吝啬的
mean_en: a quality, condition, or way of doing something that is in the middle of two extremes and better than either of them; (mathematics) the value found by adding together all the numbers in a group, and dividing the total by the number of numbers see
sentence: The green light means we can cross the road.
sentence_trans: 绿灯表示我们可以通行。
